name: Eduardo
title: Desenvolupador
profile:
Throughout my life, contact with the world of computer science and programming has been constant and enriching, eventually becoming my professional goal. I consider myself a person who works well in a team, with the ability to contribute new ideas, self-taught, and with a strong willingness to learn new concepts and strategies in the field of computer science. I am prepared to meet new challenges and new knowledge in order to carry out my tasks. I am constant, I like to promote and maintain a good working environment.
Dedicated to full-stack development, leveraging a constant and enriching background in computer science and programming.
Collaborative team player with proven ability to proactively contribute innovative solutions. Highly motivated, self-taught, and committed to continuous learning of new concepts and strategies.
Willing to meet new challenges and apply emerging knowledge to deliver tasks effectively and timely.
Reliable and consistent, with a focus on fostering a positive and productive working environment.

jobs.title: INS Lliçà
jobs.text: Vocational Training Teacher, teaching classes on security in systems, networks, and services.

jobs.title: Arrova.cat
jobs.text: Fullstack development and maintenance of various web applications, primarily built with CMS like Wordpress or PrestaShop, and custom projects developed with various programming languages.
